actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to make a grant to the Afna Education and Research Fund for the African American Memorial Tomb of the Unknown Slaves and Historical Sculpture Garden.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to make a grant to the Afna Education and Research Fund to design and build the African American Memorial Tomb of the Unknown Slaves and Historical Sculpture Garden in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to make a grant to the Afna Education and Research Fund for the African American Memorial Tomb of the Unknown Slaves and Historical Sculpture Garden.
